allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
驻爪 砖 拽转 - 拽转 转专转 驻专 转 转专 砖专转

拽转 转  转专转 -120px -100px,  注专转 -25px -20px,  驻专 -30px -25px. 住祝, 拽转 转 专 转 转专转 -6px -4px,  驻 -1.3em -1.1em,  砖专 -1.4 -1.2.

砖  驻砖专 住 砖专转 住驻转 砖 专 拽转  住 驻专.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
住驻转 驻砖  拽转 - 驻 砖 住  住驻专 拽

住驻转 砖 驻砖  拽转 砖驻砖专 住 拽转 驻:
- 砖 住 (CUSTDES)
- 住驻专 拽 (CODEDES)
- 砖 拽 (CUSTNAME)

驻砖 注  转 转注   拽.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
